news_items.content: Here is the rewritten news in a clear and concise manner, removing duplicates and keeping the original content intact:
**India News**
* Three arrested for kidnapping two delivery agents.
* Chennai's Pavan Kalyan Wraps Up Shooting for Hari Hara Veera Mallu Trailer Out Soon.
* Rajinikanth Hails Operation Sindoor, Says 'No Stopping Until Victory'.
* Domestic help sentenced to life imprisonment in separate POCSO Act cases.
* Trains on the Salem - Arakonnam route cancelled temporarily due to technical issues.
**Business and Economy**
* Chennai bus conductor wins 5-year-long legal battle against false charge.
* TN minister K N Nehru's MP son, brother diverted funds from ₹30 crore bank loan.
* UnitedHealth Now Has 1,000 AI Use Cases, Including in Claims.
* SoftBank chief: Forget AGI, ASI will be here within 10 years.
**Technology**
* Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Features New Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2 for Enhanced Durability.
* OpenAI Abandons Planned For-Profit Conversion to Focus on AI Adoption.
* Applications of unified AI by ServiceNow to untangle enterprise complexity.
**Crime and Law Enforcement**
* Two men sentenced to life imprisonment in separate POCSO Act cases.
* Man killed in Minjur; search on to nab two.
* Chennai's Panagal Park turns grey as Metro project wipes out decades-old greenery.
**Health and Science**
* Mission ShaktiSat: Chennai to host 300 students building Moon-bound payload.
* Strong dust storm hits Delhi, adjoining areas; IMD issues red alert.
* Can AI fight misinformation? Researchers explore possibility of ChatGPT.
**Sports and Entertainment**
* IPL match between PBKS and DC called off amid blackout in Dharamsala.
* SoftBank chief: Forget AGI, ASI will be here within 10 years.
**Education and Government**
* Pavan Kalyan Wraps Up Shooting for Hari Hara Veera Mallu Trailer Out Soon.
* TN minister K N Nehru's MP son, brother diverted funds from ₹30 crore bank loan.
